File APIs¶

Hash¶

This subpackage provides utilties for file managements.

calcpy.file.get_hash(path, method='sha256', batchsize=4096)¶

Get the hash value of a file

Parameters:

  • path (str)

  • method (str)

  • batchsize (int)

Returns:

str

Example

>>> from tempfile import NamedTemporaryFile
>>> with NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False) as tfile: # Create a temporary file
...     tfile.write(b'Hello world!')
...     filepath = tfile.file.name
12
>>> get_hash(filepath, method="sha256")
'c0535e4be2b79ffd93291305436bf889314e4a3faec05ecffcbb7df31ad9e51a'

calcpy
